flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Its body has beenncompressed deepnunder the ground.fAs a result, it isneven harder than andiamond.
It is said that ifnan ONIX lives fornover 100 years,fits compositionnchanges to becomendiamond-like.
The many smallnmetal particlesnthat cover thisfPOKéMON's bodynreflect brightnlight well.
STEELIX lives even further undergroundnthan ONIX. This POKéMON is known to digntowards the earth’s core.fThere are records of this POKéMONnreaching a depth of over six-tenthsnof a mile underground.
STEELIX lives even further undergroundnthan ONIX. This POKéMON is known to digntowards the earth’s core.fThere are records of this POKéMONnreaching a depth of over six-tenthsnof a mile underground.
STEELIX live even further undergroundnthan ONIX. This POKéMON is known to digntoward the earth’s core, reaching a depthnof over six-tenths of a mile underground.
It is said that if an ONIX lives for overn100 years, its composition changes tonbecome diamond-like.
Its body has been compressed deep undernthe ground. As a result, it is even hardernthan diamond.
Tempered underground undernhigh pressure and heat, itsnbody is harder than any metal.
It chews its way through bouldersnwith its sturdy jaws. Its eyes cannsee in the darkness underground.
It is thought its body transformednas a result of iron accumulatingninternally from swallowing soil.
Its body has been compressed deepnunder the ground. As a result,nit is even harder than a diamond.
It’s said that if an ONIX lives for 100nyears, its composition becomesndiamondlike as it evolves into a STEELIX.
On pense que son corps s’estntransformé à cause du fer contenundans la terre dont il se nourrit.
It is thought its body transformednas a result of iron accumulatingninternally from swallowing soil.
On pense que son corps s’estntransformé à cause du fer contenundans la terre dont il se nourrit.
It is thought its body transformednas a result of iron accumulatingninternally from swallowing soil.
The iron it ingested with the soil itnswallowed transformed its body andnmade it harder than diamonds.
The iron it ingested with the soil itnswallowed transformed its body andnmade it harder than diamonds.
ちちゅうの　たかい　あつりょくとnねつで　きたえられた　からだはnあらゆる　きんぞくよりも　かたい。
땅속의 높은 압력과n열로 단련된 몸은n어떠한 금속보다도 단단하다.
Grâce à la température élevée et à la haute pressionnsouterraines, son corps est plus dur que le métal.
Hoher Druck und hohe Temperaturen habennseinen Körper härter als Stahl werden lassen.
Su cuerpo es más duro que cualquier metal debido a langran presión y calor de su hábitat.
Temprato dalla pressione e dal calore sotterraneo,nil suo corpo è più duro di qualsiasi metallo.
Tempered underground under high pressure andnheat, its body is harder than any metal.
地中の　高い　圧力と　熱でn鍛えられた　体はnあらゆる　金属よりも　硬い。
じょうぶな　あごで　がんせきをnかみくだき　すすむ。まっくらなnちちゅうでも　みえる　めを　もつ。
튼튼한 턱으로 암석을 깨물어n부수고 나아간다. 아주 캄캄한 땅속n에서도 보이는 눈을 가지고 있다.
Ses mâchoires robustes peuvent broyer la pierre.nSes yeux percent la pénombre souterraine.
Es beißt sich mit seinen Kiefern seinen Weg durchnFelsen. Es kann auch im Dunkeln sehen.
Atraviesa rocas a mordisco limpio. Sus ojos puedennver en la oscuridad subterránea.
Distrugge le rocce con le mascelle robuste per farsinstrada. I suoi occhi vedono nei bui sotterranei.
It chews its way through boulders with itsnsturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in thendarkness underground.
丈夫な　アゴで　岩石をnかみくだき　進む。真っ暗なn地中でも　見える　目を　持つ。
イワークよりも　ふかい　ちちゅうに　すんでいる。nちきゅうの　ちゅうしんに　むかって　ほりすすみnふかさ　１キロに　たっする　ことも　ある。
롱스톤보다 깊은 땅속에 살고 있다.n지구의 중심을 향해 파고들어 가서n깊이가 1km에 달하기도 한다.
Steelix vit sous terre, encore plus profondément qu’Onix.nOn dit que ce Pokémon creuse vers le centre de la planète.nOn a déjà vu ce Pokémon descendre à plus d’un kilomètrende profondeur.
Stahlos lebt noch tiefer unter der Erde als Onix. DiesesnPokémon gräbt immer in Richtung des Erdkerns. Nachweislichnhat dieses Pokémon bereits Tiefen von 1 km erreicht.

Steelix vive a mayor profundidad aún que Onix. Se le conocenpor su tendencia a excavar hacia el interior del planeta. Hayndatos que muestran que este Pokémon ha llegado a alcanzarn1 km de profundidad.
Steelix è noto per i suoi scavi in profondità, a distanzenmaggiori rispetto a Onix. Sono stati riportati recordndi profondità pari a 1 km sottoterra.
Steelix lives even further underground than Onix.nThis Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core.nThere are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of overnsix-tenths of a mile underground.
イワークよりも　深い　地中に　すんでいる。n地球の　中心に　向かって　掘り進みn深さ　１キロに　達する　ことも　ある。
イワークよりも　ふかい　ちちゅうに　すんでいる。nちきゅうの　ちゅうしんに　むかって　ほりすすみnふかさ　１キロに　たっする　ことも　ある。
롱스톤보다 깊은 땅속에 살고 있다.n지구의 중심을 향해 파고들어 가서n깊이가 1km에 달하기도 한다.
Steelix vit sous terre, encore plus profondément qu’Onix.nOn dit que ce Pokémon creuse vers le centre de la planète.nOn a déjà vu ce Pokémon descendre à plus d’un kilomètrende profondeur.
Stahlos lebt noch tiefer unter der Erde als Onix. DiesesnPokémon gräbt immer in Richtung des Erdkerns. Nachweislichnhat dieses Pokémon bereits Tiefen von 1 km erreicht.

Steelix vive a mayor profundidad aún que Onix. Se le conocenpor su tendencia a excavar hacia el interior del planeta. Hayndatos que muestran que este Pokémon ha llegado a alcanzarn1 km de profundidad.
Steelix è noto per i suoi scavi in profondità, a distanzenmaggiori rispetto a Onix. Sono stati riportati recordndi profondità pari a 1 km sottoterra.
Steelix lives even further underground than Onix.nThis Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core.nThere are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth ofnover six-tenths of a mile underground.
イワークよりも　深い　地中に　すんでいる。n地球の　中心に　向かって　掘り進みn深さ　１キロに　達する　ことも　ある。
イワークが　１００ねん　いじょうnいきると　からだの　せいぶんがnダイヤのように　へんかする　という。
롱스톤이 100년 이상 살면n몸의 성분이 다이아몬드처럼n변한다고 전해진다.
據說當大岩蛇活到了n１００年以上，身體的成分n就會變得如同鑽石一般。
On raconte qu’il s’agit d’un Onix de plusnde 100 ans dont la structure corporellens’est rapprochée de celle du diamant.
Es heißt, dass der Körper von Onix so hart wienein Diamant werde, wenn es mehr als 100 Jahrenlebt.
Según dicen, si un Onix vive más de 100 años,nsu cuerpo adquiere una composición quenrecuerda a la de los diamantes.
Un Onix vissuto più di 100 anni.nIl suo corpo ha cambiato composizionened è diventato duro come il diamante.
It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years,nits composition changes to become diamond-like.
イワークが　１００年　以上n生きると　体の　成分がnダイヤのように　変化する　という。
据说当大岩蛇活到了n１００年以上，身体的成分n就会变得如同钻石一般。
つちと　いっしょに　のみこんだnてつぶんが　たまっていって　からだがnへんかしたとも　かんがえられる。
흙과 함께 삼킨 강철이n축적되어 몸이 변화한 것이라n여겨지고 있다.
人們認為牠的身體是因為n堆積了和泥土一起吞下的n鐵質，才會發生變化的。
On pense que son corps s’est transformé à forcend’avaler le fer contenu dans la terre en creusant.
Man glaubt, dass sich sein Körper aufgrund desnSchluckens von eisenhaltiger Erde verwandeltnhabe.
Se cree que su cuerpo se ha ido transformandonpor el hierro acumulado en la tierra que haningerido.
Si pensa che si sia trasformato a causa delnferro contenuto nella terra che mangia.
It is thought its body transformed as a result ofniron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
土と　一緒に　飲みこんだn鉄分が　溜まっていって　体がn変化したとも　考えられる。
人们认为它的身体是因为n堆积了很多和泥土一起吞下的n铁元素，才会发生变化的。
